BigShuffle.Description: The Win-Conditions of all Players get shuffled (It is possible to receive the one you originally had)

Pickpocket.Description: Steal half of the Coins of all other players (including your teammate (fuck your teammate)).

FreshStart.Description: All other Players get thrown back to their starting Space.

Stop.Description: The game terminates after 5 more turns. (Round Counter gets set to 15 after this turn ends)

Tp.Description: Move to any Space on the board.

Chameleon.Description: Use the effect of any Item in the game.

Wisdom.Description: Look at the Win-condition of any Player of your choosing.

Nothing.DisplayName: Nothing (Maybe you should've taken another Card?)

CatBell.Description: Reset the Win Condition progress of every Win Condition of one Player of your choosing. +1 Catmeme.+20Â Coins if it was your Teammate
